quotes: Commissioned into the Indian Army in December 1957
A graduate of the Australian Staff College (1968)
served with a training team in Iraq (1977-79)
was on the faculty of the Defence Services Staff College (1980-81)
was Military Adviser at the High Commission of India in London (1984-87)
As Director General of Military Operations (1991)
set up and ran the mission from 3rd March 1992 to 2nd March 1993
Retired as the Deputy Chief of the Army Staff on 31st August 1994
Director of the United Service Institution of India since 01 July 1996
Was Adviser to the Government of Sri Lanka on certain aspects of the peace process in 2002/2003
Served from 02 November 2003 to 30 November 2004 on a sixteen- member High Level Panel
to ascertain whether there have been violations of International Humanitarian Law during the operations in Lebanon in July/August 2006
